#================================================================================= # Describe Script Here # # Author: Sourav Mahato # v1.0 #================================================================================= param([string]$Name,[string]$ComputerName)
# Manual Testing section - put stuff here for manually testing script - typically parameters: #================================================================================= # $Caption = "foo" # $ComputerName = "computername.domain.com" #=================================================================================
# Constants section - modify stuff here: #================================================================================= # Assign script name variable for use in event logging. $ScriptName = "Custom.MultipleService.Availability.Monitor.DS.ps1" $EventID = "7890" #=================================================================================
# Starting Script section - All scripts get this #================================================================================= # Gather the start time of the script $StartTime = Get-Date #Set variable to be used in logging events $whoami = whoami # Load MOMScript API $momapi = New-Object -comObject MOM.ScriptAPI # Load PropertyBag function $bag = $momapi.CreatePropertyBag() #Log script event that we are starting task #$momapi.LogScriptEvent($ScriptName,$EventID,0,"`n Script is starting. `n Running as ($whoami).") #=================================================================================
# Begin MAIN script section #================================================================================= #Log script parameters we received #$momapi.LogScriptEvent($ScriptName,$EventID,0,"`nScript parameters passed into datasource: `nCaption: ($Caption). `nComputerName: ($ComputerName).")
$ServiceDetails = Get-WmiObject -Query "Select * from WIn32_Service Where Name = '$Name'" $Name = $ServiceDetails.Name #$Path = $ServiceDetails.__PATH $Caption = $ServiceDetails.Caption $StartMode = $ServiceDetails.StartMode $StartName = $ServiceDetails.StartName $State = $ServiceDetails.State
IF ($State -ne "Running") { #$momapi.LogScriptEvent($ScriptName,$EventID,1,"`nFATAL ERROR: The Service called $Name is not running") $bag.AddValue('ComputerName',$ComputerName) $bag.AddValue('Result','BadCondition') $bag.AddValue('Name',$Name) #$bag.AddValue('Path',$Path) $bag.AddValue('Caption',$Caption) $bag.AddValue('StartMode',$StartMode) $bag.AddValue('StartName',$StartName) $bag.AddValue('State',$State) }
Else { #$momapi.LogScriptEvent($ScriptName,$EventID,0,"`nHealthy: The Service called $Name is in running State.") $bag.AddValue('ComputerName',$ComputerName) $bag.AddValue('Result','GoodCondition') $bag.AddValue('Name',$Name) #$bag.AddValue('Path',$Path) $bag.AddValue('Caption',$Caption) $bag.AddValue('StartMode',$StartMode) $bag.AddValue('StartName',$StartName) $bag.AddValue('State',$State) }
# Return all bags $bag $momapi.Return($bag) #================================================================================= # End MAIN script section
# End of script section #================================================================================= #Log an event for script ending and total execution time. $EndTime = Get-Date $ScriptTime = ($EndTime - $StartTime).TotalSeconds #$momapi.LogScriptEvent($ScriptName,$EventID,0,"`n Script Completed. `n Script Runtime: ($ScriptTime) seconds.") #================================================================================= # End of script

#================================================================================= # Describe Script Here # # Author: Sourav Mahato # v1.0 #================================================================================= param($SourceId,$ManagedEntityId,$ComputerName)
# Manual Testing section - put stuff here for manually testing script - typically parameters: #================================================================================= # $SourceId = '{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000}' # $ManagedEntityId = '{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000}' # $ComputerName = "computername.domain.com" # $Computername = 'server.domain.com' #=================================================================================
# Constants section - modify stuff here: #================================================================================= # Assign script name variable for use in event logging. # ScriptName should be the same as the ID of the module that the script is contained in $ScriptName = "Custom.MultipleService.Enabled.Class.Discovery.ps1" $EventID = "1234" #=================================================================================
# Starting Script section - All scripts get this #================================================================================= # Gather the start time of the script $StartTime = Get-Date #Set variable to be used in logging events $whoami = whoami # Load MOMScript API $momapi = New-Object -comObject MOM.ScriptAPI #Log script event that we are starting task $momapi.LogScriptEvent($ScriptName,$EventID,0,"`n Script is starting. `n Running as ($whoami).") #=================================================================================
# Discovery Script section - Discovery scripts get this #================================================================================= # Load SCOM Discovery module $DiscoveryData = $momapi.CreateDiscoveryData(0, $SourceId, $ManagedEntityId) $Count = 0 #=================================================================================
# Begin MAIN script section #=================================================================================
$ServiceList = @("OMSDK","CSHOST","HealthService")
foreach ($Service in $ServiceList) { $Services = Get-WmiObject -Query "Select * from WIn32_Service Where Name = '$Service'" If ($Services){ $Name = $Services.Name #$Path = $Services.path $Caption = $Services.Caption $StartMode = $Services.StartMode $StartName = $Services.StartName $State = $Services.State $instance = $DiscoveryData.CreateClassInstance("$MPElement[Name='Custom.MultipleService.Enabled.Class']$") $instance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='Windows!Microsoft.Windows.Computer']/PrincipalName$", $ComputerName) $instance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='Custom.MultipleService.Enabled.Class']/Name$", $Name) $instance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='Custom.MultipleService.Enabled.Class']/Caption$", $Caption) $instance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='Custom.MultipleService.Enabled.Class']/State$", $State) $instance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='Custom.MultipleService.Enabled.Class']/StartMode$", $StartMode) $instance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='Custom.MultipleService.Enabled.Class']/StartName$", $StartName) $instance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='System!System.Entity']/DisplayName$", $ComputerName) $DiscoveryData.AddInstance($instance) $Count++ } }
$Message="Discovery of Custom.MultipleService.Enabled.Class has been finished, Discovered $($count) records; `n" #$momapi.LogScriptEvent($ScriptName,$EventID,0,$Message)
# Return Discovery Items Normally
$DiscoveryData
$momapi.Return($DiscoveryData) #================================================================================= # End MAIN script section
# End of script section #================================================================================= #Log an event for script ending and total execution time. $EndTime = Get-Date $ScriptTime = ($EndTime - $StartTime).TotalSeconds #$momapi.LogScriptEvent($ScriptName,$EventID,0,"`n Script Completed. `n Script Runtime: ($ScriptTime) seconds.") #================================================================================= # End of script
